body.query: FROM b* | EVAL c = CASE(f::BOOLEAN, "a", "b") | SORT a ASC | LIMIT 10

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.0-ba4b1b26728881128efde7d22b3aa612fb65a908 "Line 1:25: evaluation of [f] failed, treating result as false.
